The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 01 April is 41,459 (4,798.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 March, there were 224 new confirmed cases (25.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 March, there were 274 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 18% (50 fewer cases).
